entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
